name: Brozzme Switch and Duplicate
author: Benoti

sections.description:
A well known tools dedicated to admin posts.

Switch from the original post-type to another post-type.

Duplicate post, page or any post-type object.

The Post-type switcher is an evolution from the Post-type Switcher of John James Jacoby

General options:

  1. Enable of the tools independently of each other.
  2. On demand plugin options deletion.

Switcher & Duplicate options:

Post type Switcher:

  • Quick edit switcher
  • Bulk switcher
  • Post edit screen switcher
  • enable switch for post type in settings panel

Duplicate:

  • Quick edit link
  • Post edit link
  • new post title with old ID
  • enable or disable taxonomy copy
  • enable or disable custom fields copy
  • works with any post-type
sections.installation:
1. Upload \”Brozzme Switch Duplicate\” to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • change automatically permalink on the first save action
  • new Brozzme panel

1.2

  • bugs fixes

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: A set of tools dedicated to post type, Post-type Switcher and Post Duplicate (works with any custom post-type).
